nodes.bodyText:
We'll need comparable changes in the build.gradle with similar dependencies added (gradle can be more fussy that transitive dependencies are added). The other build.gradle files should show how to handle regular and test dependencies. You should also find examples where mockito, ocf etc are used.
The gradle build doesn't yet create our maven artifacts or run FVT, or indeed build the UI ... and needs hardcoded versions removed but the hope is to do this in future - it's SO much quicker and more flexible.
To add - it does get the dependencyManagement content from the main pom but in a slightly dubious way, again any issues here and I'll take a look
To build you can run './gradlew build' from the top level
I can pull the PR and make the changes needed if required, or point you in the right direction.
Hi, Nigel! Can you check if the changes from the latest commit solve the issue, please?
